title: Pre-Service Teacher Competency Enhancement Program Based on Higher Education Online Collaboration Models

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: A VR/simulation-based course designed under a public-private partnership model, where pre-service teachers experience online educational collaboration systems and apply them to real-world cases

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more operational structures of public-private partnership online education models.
Learners practice collaborative online class design using VR simulations at least twice.
Learners identify three or more communication issues arising in collaborative models and propose solutions.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
